content.raw: I wasn' t sure if that is a bug or something one just has to live with ;),  but we use /atlas/set_pose for automated testing and also noticed it sending the robot flying every once in a while. It also appears to kill physics (giving nans) with a smaller (but non zero) chance. This of course makes automated tests impossible, so our "solution" is to just call /atlas/set_pose multiple times in a row with a small sleep inbetween and it now works without crashing so far. Certainly not a solution, but maybe a quick fix till the cause of the problem is identified and remedied.
